name: Pod GO
details:
Multi-effect PedalOver 300 effects and models from the Helix series, M series and Legacy series
Up to 6 amplifier, speaker and effect models at the same time
Includes looper and loudspeaker simulations (Third-Party IR loading)
Integrated expression pedal
Compact and light design
Free POD Go Edit app
Controls: Interval, Cents, Delay, Shiftlevel, Mix, Menu, Save, Volume
Foot switch: Up, Down, A, B, C, D, Mode, Tap / Tuner
LED: 8 Footswitch effects
Display: 4.3" Colour LCD
Guitar input: 6.3 mm jack
EXP 2/Footswitch connection: 6.3 mm stereo
Send & Return: 2x 6.3 mm jack
Main output Left & Right: 6.3 mm jack
Amp output: 6.3 mm jack
Headphone jack: 6.3 mm jack
USB Type-B
AC adapter connector: Hollow plug socket 5.5 x 2.1 mm, negative pole inside
Current consumption: 2500 mA
Power supply via 9 V DC power adapter (included in delivery)

https://line6.com/podgo/
